statements: UPDATE recipes SET ingredients='Tomato, Onion, Pasta' WHERE recipe_id=1;
UPDATE recipes SET dietary_preferences='Vegetarian' WHERE recipe_name='Pasta Salad';
UPDATE recipes SET ingredients = 'Tomatoes, Onion, Garlic' WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE recipes SET dietary_preferences = 'Vegetarian, Gluten-Free' WHERE recipe_name = 'Green Salad';
UPDATE recipes SET ingredients = 'Chicken, Broccoli, Rice' WHERE recipe_name = 'Chicken Stir Fry';
UPDATE users SET dietary_preferences = 'Vegetarian' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE recipes SET ingredients='Eggs, Bread, Cheese' WHERE recipe_id=1;
UPDATE users SET email='example@example.com', dietary_preferences='Vegetarian' WHERE user_id=5;
UPDATE recipes SET serving_size = 4, instructions = 'Mix all ingredients together and bake at 350°F for 30 minutes' WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE ingredients SET category = 'Dairy', calories = 150, protein = 8.5 WHERE ingredient_id = 3;
UPDATE recipes SET instructions = 'Mix all ingredients in a bowl, then bake at 350°F for 30 minutes.' WHERE recipe_name = 'Chocolate Cake';
UPDATE ingredients SET category = 'Dairy' WHERE ingredient_name = 'Milk';
UPDATE recipes SET recipe_name = 'Spaghetti Carbonara', instructions = 'Cook pasta, fry bacon until crispy, mix with eggs and cheese. Serve hot.' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_ingredients SET quantity = 2, ingredient_id = 3 WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE recipes SET recipe_name='Spaghetti Carbonara', ingredients='pasta, eggs, pancetta, parmesan cheese', instructions='1. Cook pasta 2. Fry pancetta 3. Mix eggs and cheese' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE preferences SET dietary_preference='Vegetarian' WHERE user_id=5;
UPDATE Ingredients SET ingredient_name = 'Salt' WHERE ingredient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Recipes SET recipe_description = 'Delicious pasta recipe with garlic and tomatoes' WHERE recipe_id = '456e7890-e12b-45f6-b345-789012345678';
